title: Mathematics Project-Based Instruction Design Utilizing Learning Object Reuse Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Collaborative learning environment using digital devices, with real-life problem-solving projects linked to math curriculum.

learning_goals: Analyze the reusable structure of learning objects and generate a classification system with at least three levels.
Arrange learning objects used in mathematical problem-solving projects into two sequence-based configurations.
Define and apply at least five metadata elements when creating reusable learning objects.
Provide peer feedback using a rubric to evaluate learning object reuse strategies.
Produce at least two PBL (Project-Based Learning) deliverables based on repurposed learning objects using digital tools.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
